CREATE TABLE [dbo].[NYSOHtest]
(
    Period varchar(50) not null,
    LOB varchar(50) not null,
    [Plan Name] varchar(50) not null,
    NYSOH varchar(50) not null,
    WMS varchar(50) not null,
    [Grand Total] varchar(50) not null
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (Period),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://cpdlstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/cpdlfilesystem/demoPark/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
